short_description: The SERIAL_TIMESERIES node extracts simple time-dependent 1D data from an Arduino or a similar serial device.

parameters.name: record_period
parameters.description: Length between two recordings in seconds.

parameters.name: baudrate
parameters.description: Baud rate for the serial device.

parameters.name: comport
parameters.description: COM port of the serial device.

parameters.name: num_readings * record_period
parameters.description: Is roughly the run length in seconds.
